title.rendered: The Benefits of a Piezo Ultrasonic Rhinoplasty in NYC

content.rendered:
Did you know that the first rhinoplasty was performed in 1887? Since then rhinoplasty surgery has had many advancements, including the invention of the ultrasonic, or piezo rhinoplasty. 

When you’re considering plastic surgery for your nose and you’re looking for a rhinoplasty surgeon near you, it’s important to find a surgeon who specializes in facial plastic surgery and offers the most up to date techniques.

Pearlman Aesthetic Surgery is home to the best rhinoplasty surgeon in NYC. Dr. Pearlman is dual board-certified in facial and reconstructive surgery. He is one of the first surgeons in the U.S. to use the groundbreaking piezo ultrasonic rhinoplasty. Faster healing and less pain are 2 of the main benefits of using this technique.

Advantages of Piezo Rhinoplasty in NYC

  • Long-lasting, natural-looking results
  • Faster recovery timeline
  • Less bruising and swelling
  • Reduces soft tissue trauma around nose
  • Increased accuracy and precision

How does a piezo rhinoplasty work?

The device used for an ultrasonic rhinoplasty generates vibrations at extremely high frequencies that can cut and shave bone with extreme precision. The devices uses ultrasound waves tuned to a frequency that only affects the bones. Using this technique results in reduced risk of damaging the nose cartilage, skin, soft tissue or blood vessels, which leads to less bruising and a faster recovery.

With the Piezo system, Dr. Pearlman can precisely sculpt and polish the nasal bones while preserving the surrounding soft tissue, ultimately resulting in a less invasive nose job. PIezo ultrasonic rhinoplasty also helps with the burgeoning procedure, preservation rhinoplasty.

Am I a candidate for a piezo rhinoplasty in NYC?

The ultrasonic rhinoplasty is best for candidates who are looking for changes to their nasal bones, such as patients with crooked nose, wide nose, or excessive humps. Changes that are based on cartilage or skin would use a traditional rhinoplasty procedure. If Dr. Pearlman feels that preservation rhinoplasty is for you, Piezo is also utilized. 

Dr. Pearlman is a rhinoplasty specialist in NYC that can offer the best solutions for you based on your desired results and his expert advice.

Schedule your rhinoplasty consultation with Pearlman Aesthetic Surgery!

An in person consultation is the best way to determine your candidacy for a piezo rhinoplasty in NYC. Dr. Pearlman can give you an in-depth exam, including Mirror 2D and Vectra 3D imaging to help you envision your expected results.

Still not sure? You can use our virtual rhinoplasty planning tool to explore the options available to you.
